body_html: @apaszke I still stand by my earlier suggestion. I don't see that there's anything wrong with naming the cudnn convolution CuDNNConv.cpp and the MKLDNN convolution MKLDNNConv.cpp. It seems like a reasonable enough bikeshed color to me, and if it simplifies the build I'm all for it.

body: @apaszke I still stand by my earlier suggestion. I don't see that there's anything wrong with naming the cudnn convolution CuDNNConv.cpp and the MKLDNN convolution MKLDNNConv.cpp. It seems like a reasonable enough bikeshed color to me, and if it simplifies the build I'm all for it.
